lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby, the scoring champion and most valuable player in the N.H.L., signed a five-year contract extension with the Pittsburgh Penguins worth $43.5 million. The three-year contract Crosby signed as a rookie lasts through the coming season. Crosby, who will turn 20 next month, was the youngest player to win the Hart Trophy, as the league’s most valuable player, since Wayne Gretzky.
